Entries.default: A group of lagufaeth huddle around a pair of primitive sigils. They sway back and forth, chanting in a guttural, hissing tongue. They seem unaware of your presence.
You slip away before the lagufaeth catch sight of you.
The lagufaeth stumble back, bulging eyes wide with alarm. They brandish their weapons and rattle them menacingly at you.
As you creep toward the lagufaeth, the sigils are their feet begin to glow, alerting them to your presence. They scramble for their weapons and fall upon you in a hissing chorus.
